data.taskTitle: Have we run out of agent names?
Have we run out of agent names?
data.approach: Analyzed name generation system: 42 adjectives x 36 nouns = 1512 combinations in am-lib.sh. Currently 1214 unique names used (80% exhausted). Names are NOT being recycled yet, but running low on available combinations.

data.taskTitle: Have we run out of agent names?
summary: Analyzed name generation: am-lib.sh has 42 adjectives × 36 nouns = 1512 combinations
Currently 1214 unique agent names used (80% of capacity)
Names are NOT being recycled - all agents have unique names
Only 298 combinations remain before collision becomes inevitable
IDE API has larger pool (56×64 = 3584) but am-lib.sh is the bottleneck
findings: generate-name/+server.js uses 56 adjectives and 64 nouns (out of sync)
Name distribution is fairly uniform across all adjectives/nouns
9 names exist outside the standard pattern (e.g. XenonField, IronHaven)
recommendedActions: Sync both sources to same larger word lists
Add 20-30 more adjectives and nouns to reach 5000+ combinations
Alternative: add optional third word for rarer combinations

data.taskTitle: Have we run out of agent names?
summary: Investigated agent name capacity: 1,214 names used out of 1,512 combinations (80% exhausted)
Found two separate name generators - am-lib.sh (bottleneck) and IDE API (unused)
Traced redundant registration flow: IDE calls am-register, then agent calls it again
Created task tree for simplification (squad-kvtrr epic with 5 child tasks)
Updated tasktree.md to make --parent flag requirement clearer
findings: No duplicate names found - all 1,214 agents have unique names
am-lib.sh: 42 adjectives x 36 nouns = 1,512 combinations (THE BOTTLENECK)
IDE API: 56 adjectives x 64 nouns = 3,584 combinations (was dead code)
~298 combinations remained before collisions would become inevitable
Redundant flow: spawn API registers name, agent re-registers on /squad:start
recommendedActions: Child tasks squad-j2pwt and squad-sud88 already completed by other agents
Continue with remaining tasks: squad-wwkg1, squad-htoti, squad-o9yli

data.taskTitle: Have we run out of agent names?
